job.title: Entry Level Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Higher Education,Computer Software
job.description:
Check out a recording of our live info session here: https://us02web.zoom.us/rec/share/AQXd4O9IEU9rki_Q8AU-8_34XFb6SAYtY_tgo-aKjBFJtoCnTyzfD66zt19Arrja.stG9Rw7eeVLU5IVf
Accepted candidates will enter LC101, LaunchCode's flagship programming course designed to teach skills that are in high demand in the tech industry. LC101 provides a supportive virtual classroom environment with live mentoring from instructors, teaching fellows, and local engineers. For more information about the curriculum, check out the
.
Throughout the 20-week course, students will meet virtually Mondays and Thursdays from 6:30-9:30pm from September 20, 2021 through March 2022. In addition to the 6 hours of weekly class time, students spend an average of 10-20 hours each week outside of class to work on assignments, read required texts, and study material. This course is completely free and virtual, with ample support from knowledgeable and passionate teaching staff, with an exciting professional opportunity waiting at the finish line: an apprenticeship with World Wide Technology!
Following LC101, students who have completed all assignments will begin a three-month apprenticeship as a Software Engineer at World Wide Technology. In this role, apprentices will be an active, productive member of an Agile/Scrum team. They will code, test, debug, and deliver software in a team-based environment. Throughout the apprenticeship, candidates will work full-time making $20/hour plus health insurance benefits.
At the end of the 12-week period, successful apprentices will have the opportunity to convert to permanent employees at World Wide Technology, with a salary boost to $65,000 and benefits. There is incredibly high demand for new tech talent, and we love helping motivated career changers gain new skills and find great jobs like this one.
If you are craving a new career in technology but haven't had a chance to learn the necessary skills, this is the opportunity for you!
